name: Goodbye Block Editor
author: Mr. Panda

sections.description:
Goodbye gutenberg plugin made to disable inbuild text editor called Gutenberg in newely released wordpress version 5++
this plugin is one click process who dont want to setup some options or fuctions to disable new text editor
sections.installation:
Admin Installer via search

  1. Visit the Add New plugin screen and search for “Goodbye Gutenberg”.
  2. Click the “Install Now” button.
  3. Activate the plugin.

Admin Installer via zip

  1. Visit the Add New plugin screen and click the “Upload Plugin” button.
  2. Click the “Browse…” button and select zip file from your computer.
  3. Click “Install Now” button.
  4. Once done uploading, activate Goodbye Gutenberg.

Manual

  1. Upload the Goodbye Gutenberg folder to the plugins directory in your WordPress installation.
  2. Activate the plugin.

That’s it! Now you can use old classic WordPress editor or any other editor you like.

short_description: Disable New text editor called Gutenberg for WordPress
